content.title: Contextual Menus
content.tooltip: Adds context menus for inserting classes and variables.

content.title: Style Preview & Keyboard Enhancements
content.tooltip: Hit Tab to select and preview a class or hover over a class for live preview. While tabbed, you can start typing to instantly add/remove characters to the selected class name.

content.title: Hide Deactivated Classes
content.tooltip: Hides all deactivated classes from the builder dropdowns and auto-suggest.

content.title: Auto-BEM
content.tooltip: Allows you to generate BEM classes for a Block automatically in seconds.

content.title: Color Scheme Switcher (Builder)
content.tooltip: Adds a color scheme toggle to the top of the page. Click it to toggle between light and dark mode.

content.title: Auto Object Fit
content.tooltip: Automatically adds object-fit cover to your images to avoid warping.

content.title: Stack the 'Add Elements' Panel
content.tooltip: Display elements in a more efficient single-column layout.

content.title: Pro Mode for 'Add Elements'
content.tooltip: Remove the useless, pre-made, walled-garden beginner elements.

content.title: Hide Redundant Bricks Components
content.tooltip: Hide the native components that Frames components replace.

content.title: Use Bricks UI for Buttons
content.tooltip: Makes the Bricks button styles UI compatible with ACSS.

content.title: Enhance Transparent Color Swatches
content.tooltip: Adds a checkerboard background to the Bricks color swatches to better distinguish transparent colors.

content.title: Bricks Grid Visualizer
content.tooltip: Should the Bricks grid visualization overlay be on or off (off is recommended)?

content.title: Import Original Classes for Templates
content.tooltip: When you import a remote template and rename the classes, bricks imports the same template with the renamed classes instead of fresh ones - this feature prevents this and gives you the original classes of the remote templates.

content.title: Improve CSS Editing
content.tooltip: Improve the CSS editing experience in Bricks.

content.title: CSS First Styling in Bricks
content.tooltip: Move the CSS panel to the top of Style tab.

content.title: Remove Deactivated Classes
content.tooltip: Remove deactivated classes from the Bricks database when saving ACSS settings.

content.title: Load Styles in Block Editor
content.tooltip: Do you want to see ACSS styles in the Block Editor when editing content?

content.title: Use Block Editor for Page Building
content.tooltip: Do you want to configure Pages for building with the block editor?

content.title: Generate Color Palette
content.tooltip: Do you want to add ACSS colors options in the Block Editor?

content.title: Replace Color Palette
content.tooltip: Do you want to replace all default color options with ACSS in the Block Editor?

content.title: Class-First Workflow
content.tooltip: Move the 'CSS Classes' input to the top of the Block Styles panel in the Block Editor.

content.title: Page Block Width
content.tooltip: Default width of all blocks in the Block Editor when editing pages.

content.title: Post Block Width
content.tooltip: Default width of all blocks in the Block Editor when editing posts & Custom Post Types.

content.title: Page-Width Post Types
content.tooltip: Which CPTs should we apply page width to (functions.php snippet also required!).

content.title: Reduce Motion
content.tooltip: Turn off animations and transitions for users who prefer less motion (prefers-reduced-motion).

content.title: Smooth Scrolling (CSS)
content.tooltip: Activate CSS-based smooth scrolling to hashlinks (recommended over Javascript-based scrolling).

content.title: Overflow Detection
content.tooltip: Activate outlines to help identify elements that are overflowing and causing horizontal scrolling.

content.title: Admin Link Position
content.tooltip: Show the ACSS admin bar dashboard trigger.

content.title: Display Dashboard Icon
content.tooltip: Show the floating ACSS dashboard trigger on the frontend.

content.title: Delete on Deactivation
content.tooltip: Type 'yes' to delete all settings and data when deactivating the plugin. This is irreversible.

content.title: Style Buttons Automatically
content.tooltip: Apply button styling automatically without the need for a utility class.
